name: Twinkly
0:
”Alexa, turn on Twinkly”
”Alexa, turn off Twinkly”
”Alexa, set the Twinkly to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can use your own voice to control your Twinkly lights – Just ask Alexa.

Alexa voice commands are available for all Twinkly products, including Strings, Festoons, Line, and Flex, as well as Special and Gold editions.
You can ask Alexa to dim your lights using percentage values.
For example, try saying: "Alexa, set Twinkly to 50%" and Alexa will dim the light intensity to make it softer.
You can also turn Twinkly on and off remotely by saying: "Alexa, turn on Twinkly" or "Alexa, turn off Twinkly."
To configure the Twinkly skill, just use the same login as your Twinkly account.
Twinkly is the smart decoration light that allows you to light up your home with extraordinary effects, colors, and animations.
You can use Twinkly on every occasion, from Christmas decorations to Summer parties, both indoors and outdoors. 
Twinkly lights come in many different models and sizes: from the classic LED Strings to pre-lit Christmas trees to outdoor Festoon lights. 
With Twinkly Line and Flex you can become your own interior light designer, creating new shapes and color accents in your space. 
Discover the full product range on Twinkly’s website.
